name: Vigoda
tag_list: groupon, russia, groupon-russia, vigoda, vigoda-ru, living-social, kupikupon, biglion, living-social-russia, google-deals, google-deals-russia, kupibonus
description: Leading Daily Deals business in Russia
overview:
Vigoda.ru is one of the largest internet retails in Russia & Ukraine. “Groupon style” business operating in all 94 largest cities across Russia and Ukraine. Our offices are in 29 cities employ ~260 talents. 2012 revenues are expected to be around ~$250M and profitable.

$8M of investment capital has been raised.

UPDATE: in March 2011 Vigoda acquired leading Ukrainian daily deal site “Gorod24” to enter Ukrainian market.

UPDATE2: in June 2011, Vigoda.ru, won Consumer Choice 2011 Award, among such brands as Procter & Gamble.

funding_rounds.source_description: Access Industries (Len Blavatnik) invested in Vigoda

milestones.description: After first year of operations, VIGODA.ru saved 1,000,000,000 rub! Yes, 1 Billion rubles were saved for its loyal users!
Vigoda.ru won Consumer Choice 2011 Award among such legendary brands as Procter & Gamble
